name: The Endless Rebellion R3 - Origins
description:
A 2D hack and slash prototype. Featuring a stylish combat system; switch moves, cancel animations, and show off crazy combos in this fast paced action game based on MarcZaf's "The Endless Rebellion R3" sprite comic.

Controls

-W,A,S,D -Movement
-Mouse - Camera Movement
-Space - Jump
-Left Mouse Button - Attack
-C - Dash
-N- Nightmareize
- Forward + Attack - Firedrive
- Backward + Attack - Eruption
- ^ + Attack - Flare Saber(while Nightmareized)
